LanguageData.BlackPlague_Enable_FinisCollectionThough: Enable the though gained for collecting Finis Specialis.
LanguageData.BlackPlague_Enable_VesselMentalBreak: Enable the new 'touch Persona Tardus' mental break.
LanguageData.BlackPlague_Chance_InfectedTouch: The chance a pawn becomes infected after touching a Persona Tardus.
